portfolio.description: Bienvenue sur mon portfolio ! Vous trouverez ici une vitrine de mes compétences et de mon expérience.
portfolio.noProjects: Aucun projet à afficher pour le moment.
portfolio.title: Mon Portfolio

apigem.description: Books. Web application for connecting with friends and social networking.

introduction.description: Objectif Cloud is a cybersecurity company that provides services aimed at enhancing data and information protection, as well as preventing security incidents. As a developer on the team, I collaborate with my colleagues to create the "BUBO Sentry" monitoring tool, which empowers businesses to gain a comprehensive overview of their information system health. Key Contributions: - Design and develop dashboards featuring Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) - Implement dynamically loaded filters and tables - Facilitate interaction with other tools through APIs and shell scripts - Technical Expertise : Symfony 4/5, UIkit, GIT, SQL, DQL, Yarn, and ApexCharts.
introduction.introduction: Le projet principal est la réalisation d’un outil de supervision pour les entreprises désirant renforcer la qualité de leur système d’information et la protection de leurs données. Il s’agit de proposer des indicateurs permettant de surveiller le S.I. comme, par exemple, des tableaux de bord dynamiques et efficaces donnant une vision globale sur le système d’information.
introduction.name: Apigem web
introduction.title: Apigem

description: Un site web en Php 7 natif. Un template HTML CSS. Des tableaux de bord et des indicateurs. BDD MySql
1.title: Analyser de l'existant

description: Objectifs : Moderniser, éviter la redondence. Progammation orientée objet, structure MVC.
2.title: Le choix de la technologie

description: Réutilisation de l'existant (Php). Gain de temps. Templatiser. Structurer les fichiers. Webpack pour les assets.
3.title: De Bubo à Bubo Symfony

description: - Création de la base de donnée pour Symfony afin qu'elle puisse fonctionner avec Doctrine.
- Génération des entitées doctrines depuis une base de donnée existante.
- Importation des assets pour les utiliser avec WebPack et les compiler pour des raisons de lisibilité et de performences.
- Rappartieement des fonctions php et javascript afin de ne pas avoir à recréer tout le site et garder l'existant..
4.title: 4 pas beauRéalisation de la refactorisation

bubo.description: Develop a tool to monitor the information system (IS) of companies and improve its quality and data protection.

introduction.description: Objectif Cloud est une entreprise de Cyber Sécurité réalisant des prestations ayant pour vocation d’offrir une meilleure protection de la donnée et de l’information, et de prévenir les incidents de sécurité. En qualité de développeur, je réalise avec l'équipe, l'outil de supervision "BUBO Sentry" permettant aux entreprises d’avoir une vision globale de l’état de leur système d’information.
introduction.introduction: Le projet principal est la réalisation d’un outil de supervision pour les entreprises désirant renforcer la qualité de leur système d’information et la protection de leurs données. Il s’agit de proposer des indicateurs permettant de surveiller le S.I. comme, par exemple, des tableaux de bord dynamiques et efficaces donnant une vision globale sur le système d’information.
introduction.name: Bubo Cybersec
introduction.title: OBJECTIF CLOUD

description: A website in native Php 7. An HTML CSS template. Dashboards and indicators. MySql database
1.title: Analyze the existing

description: Objectives: Modernize, avoid redundancy. Object-oriented programming, MVC structure.
2.title: The choice of technology

description: Reuse of the existing (Php). Time saving. Templatize. Structure files. Webpack for assets.
3.title: From Bubo to Bubo Symfony

description: - Creation of the database for Symfony so that it can work with Doctrine.
- Génération des entitées doctrines depuis une base de donnée existante.
- Import assets to use them with WebPack and compile them for readability and performance reasons.
- Repartition of php and javascript functions so as not to have to recreate the entire site and keep the existing one..
4.title: Performing the refactoring

group.intro: This involves modernizing the site by refactoring it from a native PHP structure to Symfony 4.

description: - Analysis of the existing: Bootstrap plugin.
- Advantages: Simple implementation, wab standards, quickly functional, responsive.
- Disadvantages: theme difficult to customize. Already has an advanced design. Need an application-specific identity.
- Comparison with UIkit, Sementic UI, Bootstrap.
- Choice of UIkit because it focuses on structure rather than design. Material theme. Simple to evolve over time.
1.title: The choice of graphics plugin

description: - Use of the Yarn package manager to install the library.
- Simple command line installation of plugins.
- Disadvantages: theme difficult to customize. Already has an advanced design. Need an application-specific identity.
2.title: Installing UIkit

description: - Magical solution from Symfony to manage site assets.
- Its configuration file to fill in the list of assets that you want to load like UIkit and its icon library.
- Allows you to combine CSS and Javascript by reducing them into a public directory.
- Then simply specify the webpack entry in the branch template.
3.title: The Webpack Encore plugin

description: - Creation of the skeleton of the site. Horizontal bar for menus, colors and choice of icons. Font and footer..
- Updated counters in dahsboards. Speaking and refined visual with a material rendering.
- The counter has a title, a numerical value on a white background with a shadow effect. The number of counters is defined by the size of each column.
- Updated bootstrap tables to UIkit. Creation of a custom kit for all other components.
4.title: Setting up UIkit

description: - Analysis of the existing situation: curves in the application showing the evolution of the data.
- Disadvantages: do not match the new design and future features.
- Take advantage of the redesign of the design to evolve the curves. Installation with Yarn of Apex Charts (graph plugin based on graphJS).
- Advantages: Modern curves, colorful, dynamically displayed and supporting JQuery. Ability to zoom in on a period and export.
- Validation of data consistency
5.title: Change of charts plugin

group.intro: This involves modernizing the site by refactoring it from a native PHP structure to the Symfony 4 framework.

description: - Added a new indicator.
- Use the application to exploit the raw data sent by the external tool OpenVas which is a vulnerability scanner.
- Report the existence of a vulnerability and indicate whether it is necessary to take action to manage it.
1.title: Goals

description: - Analysis of the existing: the script, the structure of the table, the functional specifications and the graphic models.
- Creation of the Symfony entity with Doctrine as well as the properties and relationships (vulnerability details, vulnerable systems).
- I use the date of the vulnerability to know if it has appeared several times and to have a history of it.
- Generation of modifications in the database. The data is implemented by the script. The generated repository allows access to it.
2.title: Database

description: - Updated the code of all tables in the application to optimize it and improve the user experience.
- Initially, each table loads the entire data and simply reorganizes it with a simple sorting and pagination system.
- After a study of the solutions available with Symfony to dynamically change the elements to display.
- Implementation of Knp Paginator, a plugin that can load a number of data specified with parameters contained in the url, making it sortable and paginated.
- If it requires reloading the page to call the url, I enhanced it with Ajax. The url is called dynamically with javascript making the loading invisible.
- Sorting and pagination only reloads the table and not the page, with the number of elements chosen. It's faster, easier to use.
- The next step was to disseminate these modifications throughout the site and the following functions.
3.title: Dynamic and paginated tables

description: - Creation of the vulnerability controller as well as the necessary routes and functions.
- Creation of views. List of systems, their details. Details of system vulnerabilities.
- Added the possibility of excluding a vulnerability so as not to take it into account when listing vulnerable systems.
- Added many relevant metrics with numerical value, real-time trend arrow. At the click, you can filter the other information.
- Added graphs such as TOP vulnerabilities, average vulnerabilities per machine.
4.title: Graphical views

group.intro: List vulnerabilities, scan machines, and identify vulnerable machines. Format data on dashboard.

description: - After each development Sprint, carrying out a complete retesting. Highlight malfunctions and faults.
- Plan corrections for the next Sprint.
- In the event of a major modification, this is an evolution requiring a design phase.
1.title: Bug fix

description: - Significant development phase.
- Generally thinking among several people about the technical base of a new development.
- Agreeing on the vision of the evolution before planning it.
2.title: Design

description: - A major modification or the addition of a functionality.
- An improvement for the application.
- Usually requires a design phase and completed.
- Retesting ensures its operation and conformity with what was planned.
3.title: Evolution

description: - Deploy the solution to pilot companies.
- Obtain valuable feedback giving an opinion on the field of real need.
- High added value for both parties.
4.title: Start of production at pilot companies

group.intro: Tasks performed daily as a developer.

scf.description: Books. Web application for connecting with friends and social networking.

introduction.introduction:
Projet personnel visant à devenir un support supplémentaire pour une communauté de 6000 utilisateurs sur une application de tchat (Discord)
Le jeu en rapport avec le site est en déveollopement, et tous les contenus sont en anglais actuellement. Nous proposons une alternative pour la communauté francophone !
introduction.name: Star Citizen Francophone Web
introduction.title: Star Citizen Francophone

description: - Create a referencing space for French-speaking users and French-speaking organizations coming from Discord.
- Make adding data simple and automatic using a data scrapper.
- Create useful and modular tools such as fleet management, event creation and consultation of a wiki.
- Keep an application compatible with other technologies thanks to the ingestion of an API in V2.
1.title: Missions

group.intro: Create a complete and useful application for an already existing community with known needs.

group.intro: Data Interceptor est un service de l’application. Il est issue de l’api http://sc-api.com/ open source qui a été adaptée ici afin qu’elle soit utilisé comme service. Ainsi, nous n’appelons plus de route, il n’y a plus d’api. Nous utilisons directement les fonctions du service.
